hopobject.name: robot cleaner
hopobject.pname: Robot cleaner with beagleboard and dsPIC30F4011(120MHz)
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:11.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/11.0
hopobject.body:
To do this project i used different UNIX angstrom's libraries : RS232 library for communication of dsPIC30F, openCv library for cartography with a camera and laser. I used SSH to remote connection. I explain you further informations the next time. (the second goal of this project is to improve my english)
first video: manual mode: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/8S0TuPLuaWE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
automatic mode <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/sG8iyfnGp9o" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
hopobject.shortdesc: The goal of project is to create a vacuum robot cleaner which has a low consumption of energy. The beagleboard comunicate with another sPIC30F (120MHz) to able the robot to manage better the different tasks.
